text: Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: There are people who want to make men's lives more difficult for no other reason than the chance it provides them afterwards to offer their prescription for alleviating life their Christianity, for instance.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: If women were particular about men's characters, they would never get married at all.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: We sleep safe in our beds because rough men stand ready in the night to visit violence on those who would do us harm.
author: George Orwell

text: All the reasonings of men are not worth one sentiment of women.
author: Voltaire
